patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 import tkinter as tk
 
-window = tk.TK()
+window = tk.Tk()
 
 window.geometry("300x150")
 window.title("Gerencia Frases")

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -4,5 +4,11 @@
 
 window.geometry("300x150")
 window.title("Gerencia Frases")
 
+frame = tk.Frame(window)
+frame.pack(padx=10, pady=10, fill='x', expand=True)
+
+label = tk.Label(frame, text="Olá Mundo!")
+label.pack(fill='x', expand=True)
+
 window.mainloop()
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -10,5 +10,15 @@
 
 label = tk.Label(frame, text="Olá Mundo!")
 label.pack(fill='x', expand=True)
 
+frase_lab = tk.Label(frame, text="Frase")
+
+frase_lab.pack(fill='x', expand=True)
+
+frase_inp = tk.Entry(frame)
+
+frase_inp.pack(fill='x', expand=True)
+
+
+
 window.mainloop()
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -18,7 +18,12 @@
 frase_inp = tk.Entry(frame)
 
 frase_inp.pack(fill='x', expand=True)
 
+def click():
+    label.config(text=frase_inp.get())
 
+button = tk.Button(frame)
 
+button.pack()
+
 window.mainloop()
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -21,9 +21,9 @@
 
 def click():
     label.config(text=frase_inp.get())
 
-button = tk.Button(frame)
+button = tk.Button(frame, text="Enviar", command=click)
 
 button.pack()
 
 window.mainloop()
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
import tkinter as tk

window = tk.TK()

window.geometry("300x150")
window.title("Gerencia Frases")

window.mainloop()
